channel.title: Dad Jokes on Mike Charles
channel.description: Recent content in Dad Jokes on Mike Charles

item.title: Dad Jokes
item.description: I argued with my wife in a lift. I was wrong on so many levels. I’m letting other people dot the Is. But cross the Ts; that’s where I draw the line. I told my wife that she should embrace her mistakes. Then she gave me hug. Seeing my dog in the sea makes me proud. He’s a very good bouy. I read that the arabs invented the concept of zero.
